mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(NO, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, SSNUM, EMAIL, ADDRESS ,PHONE, SEX, ADMIN) values(AUTONUM.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ssnum}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{admin})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, email=#{email} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBER where ID = #{id}

select U.no, U.name, U.id, U.email, U.address, U.sex, U.ssnum, U.phone, U.admin, B.id as buyitem_id, B.sales_qty as buyitem_sales_qty, B.buy_time as buyitem_buy_time, B.state as buyitem_state, I.id as item_i_id, I.name as item_name, I.price as item_price, I.imgpath as item_imgpath, I.img as item_img, I.ic_id as item_ic_id, I.text as item_comment, I.sales_qty as item_sales_qty from T_BUYITEM B right outer join MEMBER U on U.no = B.u_id left join T_ITEM I on I.id = B.i_id where U.id = #{id} and U.password = #{password}

select U.no, U.name, U.id, U.email, U.address, U.sex, U.ssnum, U.phone, U.admin, B.id as buyitem_id, B.sales_qty as buyitem_sales_qty, B.buy_time as buyitem_buy_time, B.state as buyitem_state, I.id as item_i_id, I.name as item_name, I.price as item_price, I.imgpath as item_imgpath, I.img as item_img, I.ic_id as item_ic_id, I.text as item_comment, I.sales_qty as item_sales_qty from T_BUYITEM B right outer join MEMBER U on U.no = B.u_id left join T_ITEM I on I.id = B.i_id where U.no = #{no}

select * from MEMBER
where no = cast (#{searchKeyword} as Integer)
where id LIKE concat ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
where name LIKE concat ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
where address LIKE concat ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
order by no desc

mapper.select: select count(*) from t_favoritecategory where ic_id = #{icId} and u_id = #{uId}
